        <script>
            require(['jquery'], function (Globals) {
var script_tc1 = document.createElement("script");
script_tc1 .setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
script_tc1 .setAttribute("src", "https://ubistatic2-a.akamaihd.net/worldwide_analytics/tagcommander/ubisoftportal/ubisoftportal-wa_data.js");
document.body.appendChild(script_tc1);

var script_tc2 = document.createElement("script");
script_tc2 .setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
script_tc2 .setAttribute("src", "https://ubistatic2-a.akamaihd.net/worldwide_analytics/tagcommander/js/tc_UbiWorldWide_1.js");
document.body.appendChild(script_tc2 );

script_tc3 .setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
script_tc3 .setAttribute("src", "https://ubistatic2-a.akamaihd.net/emea/gamesites/ubiportal/tagcommander/js/tc_ubiportal_2.js");
document.body.appendChild(script_tc3);
            });
    
var pageName = 'Error 500';
        </script>
    

    <!-- TRACKING VARIABLES START //-->
    <script>
        if (!window.wa_data) {
            window.wa_data = {
                nav: {},
                profile: {},
                search: {},
                video: {},
                product: {},
                internalSearch: { searchStatus: '', searchKeyword: '', totalResults: '', resultPosition: '', searchFilter: '', autoCompletion: null }
            };

            wa_data.nav["environment"] = 'PROD';
            wa_data.nav["siteCategory"] = 'Responsive site'; //desktop,tablet or mobile phone
            wa_data.nav["siteType"] = 'Global';
            wa_data.nav["siteName"] = 'Ubisoft.com';
            wa_data.nav["siteSection"] = 'Error pages';
           
            wa_data.nav["pageName"] = pageName;
            
            wa_data.nav["newPageName"] = pageName;
            wa_data.nav["country"] = 'US'; //US
            wa_data.nav["language"] = 'en'; //FR
            wa_data.nav["doNotTrack"] = window.navigator.doNotTrack;
            wa_data.nav["genomeID"] = 'C970157E-C24D-44F3-ABA7-819B852E0E02';
            wa_data.nav["mdmBID"] = '';
            wa_data.nav["mdmIID"] = '';
            wa_data.nav["userDevice"] = 'desktop';
            wa_data.profile["uplayID"] = '';
            wa_data.profile["loginStatus"] = '';
            wa_data.profile["loginSuccess"] = '';
        }   
    </script>
